title: Bestlite Style Table Lamp - BL1
body: Designed in 1930 by Robert Dudley Best as part of the prestigious Bestlite family, Bestlite Style Table Lamp - BL1 is a coveted design worldwide with strong references to Bauhaus. Winston Churchill, former Prime Minister of Great Britain, personally chose the Bestlite Style Table Lamp for his desk in the Whitehall and history records that Churchill even took the lamp with him on his countless trips around the world.
